meanings.definition: The quality or state of being translucent.
meanings.sent1: The translucences of the glass made it perfect for privacy while still letting in light.
meanings.sent2: The artist used different levels of translucences in the painting to create depth.
meanings.sent3: The translucences of the ice cream made it look like a magical treat.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered with translucences under the stage lights.
meanings.sent5: The translucences of the water made the fish appear to be floating in air.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a material allows light to pass through it.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with a soft glow due to the translucences of the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The photographer adjusted the camera settings to capture the perfect translucences of the flower petals.
meanings.sent3: The translucences of the plastic bottle made it seem like a lantern.
meanings.sent4: The fog added an eerie translucences to the forest, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The translucences of the fabric made the dress look ethereal under the sunlight.
